synopsis.text: To those who've ever struggled to express their affection, this tale follows the lives of typical high school students as they navigate the complexities of love, laughter, tears, and heartache. Regardless of the outcome, this narrative of youth and romance unveils the precious moments they share during this formative period. With a diverse cast of relatable characters, each with their unique perspective, you're bound to find one that resonates with you. Dive into the world of Tsurezure Children, where young love unfolds in all its splendor and awkwardness, as it premieres in the Summer of 2017. Prepare to embark on a heartwarming journey filled with relatable experiences and emotional rollercoasters!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
